name: Advanced Fishing Trap
description: One approach to catching fish is by using a Fishing Trap. Though aLureis not required, attaching one can increase the quality, length, and weight of the caught fish. Additionally, certain lures can increase the odds of catching a rarer type of fish. To attach a lure to the Advanced Fishing Trap, inspect the trap by pressing 'F' and drag the lure into the dedicated lure slot.
